SA11n1121:2: tasya vivarjanaṃ yathā adhyāśayasaṃcodanasūtre-evaṃvidhānarthaśravaṇabhayabhīrukaiḥ ādikarmikabodhisattvaiḥ samādānāni yathā gṛhītāni tathā kāryam |
SA11n1121:3: evaṃ hi tairuktamete vayaṃ bhagavan adyāgreṇa tathāgatasya purataḥ evaṃ samādānaṃ kurmaḥ |
SA11n1121:4: sacedvayaṃ bhagavan adyāgreṇa bodhisattvayānikaṃ pudgalaṃ gṛhiṇaṃ vā pravrajitaṃ vā āpattyā codayiṣyāmo bhūtena vā abhūtena vā,
SA11n1121:8: visaṃvādito'smābhistathāgato bhavedarhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sacedvayaṃ bhagavan adyāgreṇa bodhisattvayānikaṃ pudgalaṃ gṛhiṇaṃ vā pravrajitaṃ vā pañcamiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ krīḍantaṃ paricārayantaṃ dṛṣṭā aprasādaṃ kuryāma,
SA11n1121:13: sacedvayaṃ bhagavan adyāgreṇa mitrakulabhikṣādakulanidānaṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ kāyapīḍāṃ cittapīḍāṃ vā kuryāma,
SA11n1121:15: sacedvayaṃ bhagavan adyāgreṇa bodhisattvayānikaṃ pudgalaṃ dṛṣṭvā ekenāpyamanojñavacanenābhāṣema,
SA11n1121:17: sacedvayaṃ bhagavan adyāgreṇa triṣkṛtvo rātreḥ triṣkṛtvo divasasya bodhisattvayānikaṃ pudgalaṃ na namasyema,
SA11n1121:19: sacedvayaṃ bhagavan adyāgreṇāsya vratasamādānasya kṛtaśo rājyapratilambhaṃ vā dhanapratilambhaṃ vā kāyajīvitaṃ vā na parityajema,
SA11n1121:21: sacedvayaṃ bhagavan adyāgreṇa śrāvakayānikaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikaṃ vā pudgalamavamanyema vayaṃ viśiṣṭatarā naite iti,
SA11n1121:28: sacedvayaṃ bhagavan adyāgreṇa vyāpādavigrahabhayādyojanaṃ vā yojanaśataṃ vā na palāyema īritāḥ samānāḥ,
SA11n1121:31: bahuśrutaṃ vā dhutaguṇinaṃ vā anyatarānyatareṇa vā guṇenātmānamudbhāvayema,
SA11n1121:33: sacedvayaṃ bhagavan adyāgreṇa praticchanna kalyāṇā vivṛtapāpā na viharema,
SA11n1121:36: tatra bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma-karmāvaraṇaṃ maitreya kṣapayitukāmena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ samādānaṃ kartavyaṃ yathā ebhiḥ kulaputraiḥ kṛtamiti ||
SA11n1121:55: idaṃ ca khalu kulaputra arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyaṃstathāgata evaṃ dharma deśayati-na pudgalena pudgalaḥ pramātavyaḥ ||
SA11n1121:58: yaḥ kulaputra ātmānaṃ rakṣitukāmastena na kasyaciccaryā vivecayitavyā |
SA11n1121:59: na pareṣāṃ vikuṭṭanā kartavyā ayamīdṛśo'yamīdṛśa iti |
SA11n1121:61: tathā kṣitigarbhasūtre'pi kathitam-atha tāvadeva bahūni śatasahastrāṇi vidvāṃsaḥ sattvā utthāyāsanādyena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamyaibamāhuḥ- vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavataḥ purata evaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kurmaḥ-yāvacciraṃ vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan saṃsāre saṃsarema,
SA11n1121:73: mā kuṭumbijyeṣṭhasthānam yāvatsarvaśo vayaṃ mā sattvānāmadhipatisthānaṃ pratilabhema,
SA11n1121:79: mā tehi saṃstavaṃ sārdhaṃ kuryāstvaṃ kāli paścime ||
SA11n1121:84: na teṣāṃ skhalitaṃ paśyed bodhimaṇḍaṃ vipaśyatām |
SA11n1121:85: pratighātaṃ na janayet maitracittaḥ sadā bhavet ||
SA11n1121:87: yādṛśaṃ kāhiti karma tādṛśaṃ lapsyate phalam ||
SA11n1121:91: evaṃ citta pradadhyāstvaṃ sarve bheṣyanti nāyakāḥ ||iti ||
SA11n1121:92: yasyaṃ ca bodhicittotpādike gauravaṃ prasādaśca notpadyete,
SA11n1121:93: tena svadurgatiprapātabhayarakṣārtha dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaprāmodyānubhavanārtha svacittakaluṣaprasādanārtha cittakalyatācittakarmaṇyatāpratilābhārthaṃ ca yathā āryagaṇḍavyūhe bodhicittotpādikaguṇā bhagavadāryamaitreyeṇāryasudhanamadhikṛtyodbhāvitāstathā bhāvayitavyāḥ ||
SA11n1121:101: tasya kṣema diśadaiśikaḥ prabhuḥ sārthavāha jagato bhaviṣyati ||
SA11n1121:103: śūrabhūta abhayasya dāyako deśiko hi jagato bhaviṣyati ||
SA11n1121:107: dharmadhātu gagane samudrato buddhasūrya samudeśyate ayam ||
SA11n1121:110: āśaye dṛḍhatale pratiṣṭhito bodhicarya anupūrva udgataḥ |
SA11n1121:121: durlabhā jagi sadevamānuṣe yādṛśo ayu viśuddhamānasaḥ ||
SA11n1121:127: eṣa sarvajagamokṣaṇodyato eṣa te sada viśeṣapaṇḍitaḥ ||
SA11n1121:133: tathā adhyāśayasaṃcodanasūtre'pyanarthavivarjana muktam-caturbhirmaitreya dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalaḥ paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne'kṣato'nupahataḥ svastinā parimokṣyate |
SA11n1121:146: punaratraivāha-ādikarmikeṇa maitreya bodhisattvena prajñābalādhānaprāptena lābhasatkāraparivarjitena lābhasatkāradoṣadarśinā bhavitavyam |
SA11n1121:154: iha maitreya bodhisattvena mahāsattvena rāgasaṃjanano lābhasatkāraḥ pratyavekṣitavyaḥ |
SA11n1121:178: ime evaṃrūpā maitreya lābhasatkāre ādīnavā ye bodhisattvena pratyavekṣitavyāḥ |
SA11n1121:182: alpecchasya hi maitreya ime evaṃrūpā doṣā na bhavanti,
SA11n1121:197: imāṃ maitreya evaṃrūpāmanuśaṃsāṃ viditvā paṇḍitena bodhisattvenādhyāśayenālpecchatāyāṃ rantavyam |
SA11n1121:200: vijahma rāgaṃ vijahma doṣaṃ na tiṣṭhate saṃgaṇikāsu yogī |
SA11n1121:201: bhavatyasau tatpravaṇastannimnaḥ etena doṣeṇa ratiṃ na kuryāt ||
SA11n1121:202: auddhatya hāsyaṃ ca tathā vitarkā bhavantyamī saṃgaṇikāsu sarve |
SA11n1121:203: saṃkīrṇacārī hi bhavatyasaṃvṛtaḥ karoti yaḥ saṃgaṇikāmasārām |
SA11n1121:204: lokasya mantreṣu ramanti bālā hīyanti cehāgrakathāsu bālāḥ |
SA11n1121:205: pradoṣa vardhenti vitarka utsadā etena doṣeṇa na tatra rājate ||
SA11n1121:206: na vardhate cāpi śrutena bhikṣuḥ ayuktamantreṣu ratiṃ janitvā |
SA11n1121:207: tasmāt parityajya ayuktamantrān dharme ratiṃ vindatha nityakālam ||
SA11n1121:208: sahastraśo'sthīni mayā svakāni tyaktāni bodhiṃ pratikāṅkṣa tarhi |
SA11n1121:209: na cāsmi tṛptaḥ śṛṇamāna dharma te khedamepyanti śṛṇonta dharmam ||
SA11n1121:211: dharme vare tatra ratiṃ janetha yo durlabhaḥ kalpaśatairanekaiḥ ||
SA11n1121:212: vane vasantena guṇārthikena parasya doṣā na hi vīkṣitavyāḥ |
SA11n1121:213: ahaṃ viśiṣṭo ahameva śreṣṭho na eva cittaṃ samupādanīyam ||
SA11n1121:214: mado ayaṃ sarvapramādamūlo na hīnabhikṣū avamanyitavyāḥ |
SA11n1121:215: anupūrva eṣo iha śāsanasya naikena janmena labheta bodhim ||
SA11n1121:217: agauravo bhoti śrutena matto vivādamantreṣu niviṣṭa bhoti |
SA11n1121:218: muṣitasmṛtiścāpi asaṃprajanyo bhāṣye ramantasya ime hi doṣāḥ ||
SA11n1121:219: adhyātmacintāttu sudūra bhotī cittaṃ na kāyaśca prasanna bhoti |
SA11n1121:220: unnāmanāmāni bahūni gacchatī bhāṣye ramantasya ime hi doṣāḥ ||
SA11n1121:221: saddharmacittāttu praṇaṣṭu bālaḥ sukarkaśo bhoti asnigdhacittaḥ |
SA11n1121:222: vipaśyanāyāḥ śamathācca dūre bhāṣye ramantasya ime hi doṣāḥ ||
SA11n1121:223: agauravo bhoti sadā gurūṇāṃ paligodhamantreṣu ratiṃ janitvā |
SA11n1121:224: asārasthāyī parihīṇaprajño bhāṣye ramantasya ime hi doṣāḥ ||
SA11n1121:225: amānito devagaṇaiḥ sa bhoti nāpyasya tasmin spṛha saṃjananti |
SA11n1121:226: pratisaṃvidāto bhavatī vihīno bhāṣye ramantasya ime hi doṣāḥ ||
SA11n1121:227: paribhāṣyate cāpi sa paṇḍitebhiḥ ye kecidastī pṛthakāmasākṣī |
SA11n1121:228: nirarthakaṃ jīvitu tasya bhotī bhāṣye ramantasya ime hi doṣāḥ ||
SA11n1121:229: sa śocate kālu karotu bālaḥ pratipattihīno'smi kimadya kuryām |
SA11n1121:230: suduḥkhito bhoti alabdhagādho bhāṣye ramantasya ime hi doṣāḥ ||
SA11n1121:231: calācalo bhoti tṛṇaṃ yatheritaṃ vicikitsate evamasau na saṃśayaḥ |
SA11n1121:232: na tasya jātū dṛḍha buddhi bhotī bhāṣye ramantasya ime hi doṣāḥ ||
SA11n1121:233: naṭo yathā tiṣṭhati raṅgamadhye anyāna śūrāṇa guṇān prabhāṣate |
SA11n1121:234: svayaṃ ca bhotī pratipattihīno bhāṣye ramantasya ime hi doṣāḥ ||
SA11n1121:235: śaṭhaśca so bhoti laghurnirāśaḥ punaḥ punaścāramate vivādam |
SA11n1121:236: so dūrato āryadharmasya bhotī bhāṣye ramantasya ime hi doṣāḥ ||
SA11n1121:237: saṃhṛṣyate satkṛta alpasthāmaḥ prakampate viprakṛto ajānī |
SA11n1121:238: kapiryathā cañcalacitta bhotī bhāṣye ramantasya ime hi doṣāḥ |peyālaṃ ||
SA11n1121:239: ramitva bhāṣyasmi ciraṃ pi kālaṃ na vindate prītimihātmasaukhyam |
SA11n1121:240: varaṃ hi ekasya padasya cintanā prītiṃ pade yatra labhedanantām ||
SA11n1121:242: bhuktvā tvacaṃ neha punaḥ sa śakyaṃ labdhuṃ nareṇekṣurasaṃ pradhānam ||
SA11n1121:243: yathā tvacaṃ tadvadavaihi bhāṣyaṃ yathā rasastadvadihārthacintā |
SA11n1121:244: tasmāddhi bhāṣye tu ratiṃ vihāya cintetha arthaṃ sada apramattāḥ ||
SA11n1121:246: mahañca so vardhati mohajālaṃ vicikitsako bhoti sa dṛṣṭiprāptaḥ ||
SA11n1121:247: dṛṣṭīkṛtānyasya bahūni bhontī yasmā na middhe'bhiratiṃ prayāti ||
SA11n1121:248: prajñā ca teṣāṃ bhavatī sudurbalā parihīyate buddhi na tasya bhoti ||
SA11n1121:249: jñānācca so hīyati nityakālaṃ yasmā na middhe'bhiratiṃ prayāti ||
SA11n1121:250: kusīda ajño alaso aprajño amanuṣya avatāra labhenti tasya |
SA11n1121:251: viheṭhayante ca vane vasantaṃ yasmā na middhe'bhiratiṃ prayāti ||
SA11n1121:252: kuśalena cittena sadā anarthiko dharme na chando na hi bhoti tasya |
SA11n1121:253: adharmakāmaśca sa bhoti bhūyo yasmā na middhe'bhiratiṃ prayāti ||
SA11n1121:254: saddharmachendena bihīna mūḍhaḥ parihīyate sarvaguṇehi bālaḥ |
SA11n1121:255: śuklaṃ ca dhāteti tamo'dhigacchatī yasmā na middhe'bhiratiṃ prayāti ||
SA11n1121:256: aviśārado bhoti pralīnacittaḥ prāmodya tasyo bhavatī na nityam |
SA11n1121:257: nidrayāpagrastaḥ śithilāṅga bhotī yasmā na middhe'bhiratiṃ prayāti ||
SA11n1121:258: ātmā tu jñātvā ca kusīdaprāptaḥ īrṣyāyate vīryabalairupetān |
SA11n1121:259: vīryānvitānāṃ ca avarṇa bhāṣate yasmā na middhe'bhiratiṃ prayāti peyālaṃ |
SA11n1121:261: sarvehi buddhairhi sadā praśastaṃ taṃ vīryamāryaṃ satataṃ bhajasva ||
SA11n1121:263: sudurvaco bhoti gurūbhi coditaḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ gṛhṇati nānuśāsanam |
SA11n1121:264: vipannaśīlaśca sa bhoti kṣipraṃ doṣā amī karmarate bhavanti ||
SA11n1121:265: utkaṇṭhito bhoti sa nityakālaṃ gṛhasthakarmāṇi sadā vicintayan |
SA11n1121:266: dhyānaprahāṇaiśca na tasya kṛtyaṃ doṣā amī karmarate bhavanti ||
SA11n1121:267: tīvraśca saṃjāyati tasya rāgo rasāraseṣu grasitaḥ sa mūrcchitaḥ |
SA11n1121:268: na tuṣyate'sāvitaretareṇa doṣā amī karmarate bhavanti ||
SA11n1121:269: mahatyā ca bhotī pariṣāya tuṣṭo sa duḥkhito bhoti tayā vihīnaḥ |
SA11n1121:270: saṃkīrṇa bhotī sa yatheha gardabho doṣā amī karmarate bhavanti |peyālaṃ ||
SA11n1121:271: divā ca rātrau ca ananyacitto bhakte ca cole ca bhavatyabhīkṣṇam |
SA11n1121:272: svanarthiko bhoti guṇaiḥ sa sarvadā doṣā amī karmarate bhavanti ||
SA11n1121:273: kṛtyānyasau pṛcchati laukikāni ayuktamantraiśca ratiṃ prayāti |
SA11n1121:274: yuktaiśca mantraiḥ sa na vindate ratiṃ doṣā amī karmarate bhavanti |peyālaṃ ||
SA11n1121:275: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat-suparīttaprajñāste bhagavan bodhisattvā bhaviṣyanti vihīnaprajñā ye'gradharmān varjayitvā hīnāni karmāṇyārapsyante |
SA11n1121:277: evametadyathā vadasi-suparīttaprajñāste bodhisattvā bhaviṣyanti ye'gradharmān parivarjayitvā hīnāni karmāṇyārapsyante |
SA11n1121:280: na te bodhisattvāstathāgataśāsane pravrajitā yeṣāṃ nāsti yogo nāsti dhyānaṃ nāsti prahāṇaṃ nāstyadhyayanaṃ nāsti bāhuśrutyaparyeṣṭiḥ |
SA11n1121:281: api tu maitreya dhyānaprahāṇaprabhāvitaṃ tathāgataśāsanaṃ jñānasaṃskṛtaṃ jñānasamāhitamabhiyogaprabhāvitam,
SA11n1121:285: sacenmaitreya vaiyāpṛtyābhirato bodhisattvaḥ saptaratnamayaiḥ stūpairimaṃ trisāhastramahāsāhastraṃ lokadhātuṃ pūrayet,
SA11n1121:286: nāhaṃ tenārādhito bhaveyaṃ na mānito nāpi satkṛtaḥ |
SA11n1121:295: tasmāttarhi maitreya bodhisattvena yogārthikena vīryamārabdhukāmena prajñāyāmabhiyoktavyamiti ||
SA11n1121:297: aṣṭākṣaṇā tasya na bhonti dūre kṣaṇasaṃpadā tasya na bhoti śreṣṭhā |
SA11n1121:298: ete anarthāsya bhavanti nityaṃ doṣā amī tasya prapañcacāriṇaḥ |peyālaṃ ||
SA11n1121:299: doṣānimān samyagavetya paṇḍitaḥ sarvān prapañcān parivarjayīta |
SA11n1121:300: sulamā anarthā hi prapañcacāriṇaḥ tasmātprapañcena na saṃvaseta ||
SA11n1121:301: yāyācchataṃ yojanakaṃ paraṃ varaṃ yatra prapañco'sti ya vigraho vā |
SA11n1121:302: na tatra vāsaṃ na niketu kuryānmuhūrtamātraṃ sti ya yatra kleśaḥ ||
SA11n1121:303: nārthārthikāḥ pravrajitā guṇārthikā mā vigrahaṃ kurvatha duṣṭacittāḥ |
SA11n1121:304: na vo'sti kṣetraṃ na kṛṣirvaṇijyā syuryasya arthāya prapañca ete ||
SA11n1121:305: na putra dhītā na ca vo'sti bhāryā na cāsya mitraṃ na ca bandhuvargaḥ |
SA11n1121:306: dāsyo na dāsā na ca īścaratvaṃ mā vigrahaṃ kurvatha pravrajitvā ||
SA11n1121:308: śāntapraśāntā upaśānta bhotha prapañca varjitva janetha kṣāntim ||
SA11n1121:309: āśīviṣān rakṣatha raudracittān narakāśca tiryagviṣayo yamasya |
SA11n1121:310: prapañcacārasya na bhonti dūre tasmāddhi kṣāntau janayeta vīryam |peyālaṃ ||
SA11n1121:311: imena yogena labheta śuddhiṃ kṣa[pa]yitva karmāvaraṇaṃ aśeṣam |
SA11n1121:312: dharṣeti māraṃ sabalaṃ savāhanaṃ yo dhīru tasyaiva janeti kṣāntim || iti ||
SA11n1121:313: saṃkṣepatastatra anarthavivarjanamuktam- tasmāttarhi maitreya bodhisattvayānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmapralope vartamāne akṣatenānupahatena svastinā parimoktukāmena sarvakarmāvaraṇāni kṣapayitukāmenāsaṃsargābhiratena bhavitavyamaraṇyavanaprāntavāsinā anabhiyuktasattvaparivarjitenātmaskhalitagaveṣiṇā paraskhalitāgaveṣiṇā tūṣṇībhāvābhiratena prajñāpāramitāvihārābhirateneti ||
SA11n1121:315: anyatra yeṣu sthāneṣu caṇḍā vā kukkurāstaruṇavatsā vā gāvaḥ prakṛtiduḥśīlā vā tiryagyonigatā viheṭhanābhiprāyā vā strīpuruṣadārakadārikāḥ,
SA11n1121:318: anenaitaddarśitaṃ bhavati yad dṛṣṭe'pi bādhākare evaṃvidhe tadavarjayata āpatirmavatīti ||
SA11n1121:326: yathā candrapradīpasūtre kāyasaṃvaramadhye paṭhayate-na hastalolupo bhavati na pādalolupaḥ hastapādasaṃyata iti ||
SA11n1121:327: tathā daśadharmakasūtre'pi deśitam- hastavikṣepaḥ pādavikṣepo'dhāvanaṃ paridhāvanaṃ laṅghanaṃ plavanam,
SA11n1121:329: āryadharmasaṃgītisūtre tu yathā bodhisattvānāṃ parārthādanyatkarma na kalpate,
SA11n1121:333: tatsarvaṃ sattvāvekṣitaṃ pravartate mahākaruṇādhipateyaṃ sattvahitādhiṣṭānanimittaṃ sarvasattvahitasukhādhyāśayapravṛttam |
SA11n1121:334: sa evaṃhitāśayaḥ evaṃsaṃjñī bhavati- sā mayā pratipattiḥ pratipattavyā yā sarvasattvānāṃ hitāvahā sukhāvahā ca |
SA11n1121:339: evameva yato yata eva cittasya chidraṃ bhavati,
SA11n1121:344: yeyaṃ bodhisattvacaryāyā aparityāgenābhyasyamānā abhayastā vā sarvabhāvaśūnyatā |
SA11n1121:346: tathā akṣayamatisūtre'pi darśitam- pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayati |
SA11n1121:347: atra prastāve yāni cānyāni punaḥ kānicidanyānyapi cittavikṣepakarāṇi,
SA11n1121:350: yāvadime ucyante pāpa[kā] akuśalā dharmā iti ||
